EmailTemplate.name: 2019.12.04 - BS - Custom Stamps.BS - Custom stamps
EmailTemplate.subject: This will get your business noticed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/custom-stamps.aspx?cmp=EBBSCUSTOMSTAMPDEC19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> We’re excited to let you know that we’ve expanded our Print & Marketing Products. You can now easily order all your custom stationery, business cards, signage and more online. Plus, you have the ability to quickly access your print file any time in the future, if you want to edit or repeat your print order.
So, for all your business print needs in one place, you know where to go. LEARN MORE <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/custom-stamps.aspx?cmp=EBBSCUSTOMSTAMPDEC19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special-order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
